rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Koikoi has fallen in love with
many different Drivers, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
All Drivers are so meticulous, I
can't help but fall for them, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They equip accessories to
polish themselves up...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0004
rows.name:
They buy Core Chips
for their Drivers...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0005
rows.name:
They collect lots of collection
items for their Assist Cores...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0006
rows.name:
And they accompany their
Blades through various
trials for their growth, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Moh?! I need to stop chatting
and get back to work, so many
customers are here, mo?!
